entries.armor_appearance_enhancement: Strengthens the materials and adds enhancements to the armor during the appearance determining stage of armor construction.
entries.armor_appearance_enhancement_2: Strengthens the materials and adds enhancements to the armor during the appearance determining stage of armor construction.
entries.armor_core_enhancement: Strengthens the materials used in armor core construction and reinforces normally hard-wearing spots.
entries.armor_segement_chitin_kliknick: Some remains from a Kliknik that are suitable for use as a chitin armor segment.
entries.armor_segement_composite_krayt: Some remains from a Krayt dragon that are suitable for use as a composite armor segment.
entries.armor_segement_padded_rancor: Some remains from a Rancor that are suitable for use as a padded armor segment.
entries.armor_segment_bone_advanced: An advanced segment of bone armor.
entries.armor_segment_bone_donkuwah: Some remains from a Donukwah which are suitable for use as a bone armor segment.
entries.armor_segment_chitin_advanced: An advanced segment of chitin armor.
entries.armor_segment_composite_advanced: An advanced segment of composite armor.
entries.armor_segment_enhancement: Strengthens the materials used in segment construction and reinforces normally hard-wearing spots.
entries.armor_segment_kashyyykian_black_mtn: A segment of Kashyyykian Black Mountain armor.
entries.armor_segment_kashyyykian_black_mtn_adva: An advanced segment of Kashyyykian Black Mountain armor.
entries.armor_segment_kashyyykian_ceremonial: A segment of Kashyyykian Ceremonial armor.
entries.armor_segment_kashyyykian_ceremonial_adv: An advanced segment of Kashyyykian Ceremonial armor.
entries.armor_segment_kashyyykian_hunting: A segment of Kashyyykian Hunting armor.
entries.armor_segment_kashyyykian_hunting_advanc: An advanced segment of Kashyyykian Hunting armor.
entries.armor_segment_padded_acklay: This Acklay hide could make an effective padded armor segment.
entries.armor_segment_padded_advanced: An advanced segment of padded armor.
entries.binding_and_reinforcement: Strengthens seams and edges of materials used and reinforces normally hard-wearing spots.
entries.body: Forms the body of the item itself.
entries.clasp_heavy_duty: A strong metal clasp, primarily used in the tailoring of clothing and accessories.
entries.clothing_treatment_crystalline: This nebulizer is used to deliver a liquid concentration containing micro-crystals during the tailoring of clothing. The treatment helps give the garment a lustrous shine, as well as prevent wear and tear on outfits that are meant for active use.
entries.fiberplast_panel: A woven panel of cloth made from fiberplast.  Used extensively in the tailoring of clothing.
entries.leather_heavy_duty: A large portion of thick leather. This could probably be used in the tailoring of clothing or accessories.
entries.metal_fasteners: Small metal fasteners that can be used as buttons or snaps on clothing.
entries.padding_segment: A square of padded fabric. It appears as if it might be used in the construction of a piece of armor.
entries.refined_hide: This is a patch of refined hide.
entries.refined_textile: A swath of refined textile (weaved fabric).
entries.reinforced_fiber_panels: A metal woven reinforced cloth panel used in making highly wear resistant clothing.
entries.schematic_apron_s01_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft a Crafter's Apron.  You must be a Master Tailor to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.schematic_backpack_s03_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft a Lightweight Military Pack.  You must be at least have achieved Domestics Fundamentals I, to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.schematic_backpack_s06_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft a Spec-Ops Field Agent Pack.  You must be at least a Novice Tailor to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.schematic_bandolier_s02_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft a Droidsmith's Tool Set.  You must be at least a Novice Tailor to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.schematic_bandolier_s04_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft a Weaponsmith's Tool Set.  You must be at least a Novice Tailor to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.schematic_belt_s05_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft a Demolitionist's Belt.  You must be at least a Novice Tailor to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.schematic_dress_s08_quest: This document contains the information necessary to craft an Exquisite Dancer's Leotard.  You must be a Master Tailor to understand the intricate details in this document.
entries.synthetic_cloth: This is a swath of synthetic cloth.
entries.trim: Some trim.  This is used in tailoring.
